channel.title: TапОК on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in TапОК on Rusland 1

item.title: TапОК – Every Day is Winter
item.description: And then, the холодильник (fridge) and the кошелёк (wallet) are also пустой (empty). From Гроза Танцполов, released in 2017. Text More about TапОК or TapOK on Facebook and VK. Recent (2020) is the album Кончало. Listen via Apple Music, Spotify, or YouTube (Playlist).
